## SendableMoneyp.unstakeMP() method

Withdraw MP from staking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeMP(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of MP to withdraw. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the MP stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) and [BPD gain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md)<!-- -->.
